titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: PATIENT DIAGNOSIS INDICATOR (SEROCONVERSION ILLNESS) - Description

div.p: PATIENT DIAGNOSIS INDICATOR (SEROCONVERSION ILLNESS) is the same as attribute PATIENT DIAGNOSIS INDICATOR for Seroconversion illness.

For the HIV and AIDS Reporting Data Set, PATIENT DIAGNOSIS INDICATOR (SEROCONVERSION ILLNESS) is an indication of whether the PATIENT had evidence of Seroconversion illness at the PATIENT DIAGNOSIS of Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV).
